name: gusplease
text: A comment left by gusplease was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NaughtyByN8ture, Connellingus, miaou)

name: jessicabunny
text: A comment left by jessicabunny was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, Anniqu3, Connellingus, Flaaron, lux, aHatOfPig, mystkmanat, clintisiceman, Darthemed)

name: rogergs
text:
Also in bold: a pack of Newports and Puma sweats.

Now the money's gettin' stuck to the gum under the table.

name: rowboat
text: That's what Ray gets when he misuses what Lucifer invents.

name: norrin
text:
That's what ya get when ya misuse what I invent. Your empire falls and ya lose every cent.

I knew I recognized some Wu Tang there.

name: lightupafatty
text: daaaaamn cold droppin' a very apt wu tang ref. you are raw.

name: spikey
text: The cat in the thong is blinded by greed.

name: minortough
text: I'm not sure he's so much "blinded by greed" as the Red Limo is all he needs to be happy.

name: philosophe
text: Alt Text: The cat in the thong is blinded by greed

name: charchar
text: The cat in the thong is blinded by having no eyeballs.

name: jesler729
text: This one is great. How can it be below 4?

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Roast Beef: good to have around.

name: foetus_punch
text: I have to admit, having a red limo would be pretty sweet. You just never see one, you know?

name: wallabeechamp
text: That's what I was thinking, too! A red limo? No one has one of those! Better than percentages and bonuses every day of the week!
